form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES
form.official-title: To repeal title II of the REAL ID Act of 2005 in order to safeguard civil liberties and individual privacy.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Safeguarding Personal Information Act of 2025.

section.header: Repeal of certain requirements for documents accepted for Federal identification purposes
section.text: Title II of the REAL ID Act of 2005 (49 U.S.C. 30301 note; division B of Public Law 109–13) is repealed.

subsection.text: Section 2502(b)(3) of the Afghanistan Supplemental Appropriations Act, 2022 (8 U.S.C. 1101 note) is amended by striking under section 202 of the REAL ID Act of 2005 (division B of Public Law 109–13; 49 U.S.C. 30301 note), notwithstanding subsection (c)(2)(B) of such Act.
Section 475(5)(I) of the Social Security Act(42 U.S.C. 675(5)(I)) is amended by striking in accordance with the requirements of section 202 of the REAL ID Act of 2005.
